languages.text: "Мастер ван Калокс — блестящий биомант, Ваша Светлость, однако, насколько мне известно, не слишком сведущ в телепатии и ограждающих псайкерских ритуалах?"
"Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"
languages.original_text: "Мастер ван Калокс — блестящий биомант, Ваша Светлость, однако, насколько мне известно, не слишком сведущ в телепатии и ограждающих псайкерских ритуалах?"

traits.locale_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but as far as I know he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"
"Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but as far as I know he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

"Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

languages.text: «El maestro van Calox es un biomante brillante, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero, hasta donde sé, no tiene una predisposición particular hacia la telepatía o los rituales protectores de los psíquicos. ¿Me equivoco?».
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

traits.locale_text: «El maestro van Calox es un biomante brillante, mi{mf|lord|lady}, pero, hasta donde sé, no tiene una predisposición particular hacia la telepatía o los rituales protectores de los psíquicos. ¿Me equivoco?».

languages.text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックスは優秀なバイオマンサーだが、私の知る範囲では、テレパシーや異能者の守護の儀式に長けているわけではない…そうだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ヴァン・カロックスは優秀なバイオマンサーだが、私の知る範囲では、テレパシーや異能者の守護の儀式に長けているわけではない…そうだろう？」

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师是位出色的生物系灵能者，大人。不过据我所知，他并不擅长心灵感应，也并不了解如何在仪式期间保护其他灵能者，是这样吧？”
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯大师是位出色的生物系灵能者，大人。不过据我所知，他并不擅长心灵感应，也并不了解如何在仪式期间保护其他灵能者，是这样吧？”

languages.text: "Meister van Calox ist ein brillanter Biomantiker, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch meines Wissens tut er sich nicht sonderlich hervor, wenn es um Telepathie oder psionische Schutzrituale geht. Liege ich da falsch?"
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

traits.locale_text: "Meister van Calox ist ein brillanter Biomantiker, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, doch meines Wissens tut er sich nicht sonderlich hervor, wenn es um Telepathie oder psionische Schutzrituale geht. Liege ich da falsch?"

languages.text: « Maître van Calox est un brillant biomancien, mais pour autant que je sache, la télépathie et les rituels protecteurs des psykers ne font pas partie de son champ d'expertise, si ? »
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"

traits.locale_text: « Maître van Calox est un brillant biomancien, mais pour autant que je sache, la télépathie et les rituels protecteurs des psykers ne font pas partie de son champ d'expertise, si ? »

languages.text: "Üstat van Calox, muhteşem bir biyobaz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak bildiğim kadarıyla ne telepati ne de ruhsezerlerin koruma ayinlerinde çok da uzman sayılmaz, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Master van Calox is a brilliant biomancer, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, but, as far as I know, he is not particularly adept at telepathy or psykers' protective rituals, is he?"
